The FORBES Magazine Collection;

First oil sketch:  Sotheby’s Belgravia, London, October 24, 1972, lot 76.;

Second oil sketch:  Christie’s, London, November 9, 1973, lot 193; Phillips, London, February 12, 1973.;

Third oil sketch:  Sotheby’s, Belgravia, London, October 24, 1972, lot 77.;
